page.title: 07A CHILD'S HOME IN GLADESTRY
page.content: I live at Gladestry .My house is called Little Wern Willa. It is also called The Pitch. My house is old.My house is partly modernized, because it has a bathroom and electricity. It is about 150 years old. My home is on a farm. The farm buildings are very close to the house. The house is made of stone. The roof is made of slate. We have a new porch. Down stairs we have a pantry, a living-room, a kitchen and a bath-room. In our kitchen there is a cooker, a phone, a washing machine and a food mixer. In the sitting-room there is a colour television. There are two bed-rooms. There is an inside toilet which is in the bath-room. Our house is heated by a Rayburn. We have got a garage. We have got a car and some farm vehicles.
